p: In addition, RBL-2H3 cells incubated into 48-well plate (3 × 10 5 cells/mL) in MEM with 10% FBS overnight were washed 2 times with SB buffer, and then incubated with SBC buffer. Cells were then pretreated with ZCO at the concentration of 0.0025, 0.005, and 0.01% or quercetin (20 μM) for 1 h prior to stimulation with 30 ng/mL of PMA and 350 ng/mL of A23187 for 1 h at 37°C, and stopped on ice for 5 min, then cell supernatants were collected for β-hexosaminidase activity assay, as described previously ( Su et al., 2018).
